programme.desc: Champaklal and Tapu help Jethalal fix the button of his shirt. Meanwhile, Bhide and Popatlal get into a fight with each other.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Goli accidentally starts Bhide's scooter and wakes Bhide up from his sleep. After Bhide goes back to sleep, Tappu, Goli, and Gogi take his scooter out for a drive.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bavri gives Tappu, Goli, and Gogi driving lessons using Bhide's scooter. Later, Bhide notices his scooter is missing and wakes up Madhvi.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide sees the dirt on his scooter and realises someone must have stolen it. However, Jethalal becomes furious when Bhide accuses Tappu.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide talks to all the residents in Gokuldham as he tries to find out who has stolen his scooter. Meanwhile, the kids are nervous Bhide will realise they are culprits.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide drinks a packet of tea to stay awake during the night as he hopes to catch the culprits. Meanwhile, Tappu, Goli, and Gogi plan to make Bhide fall asleep.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tappu buys a special oil to make Bhide fall asleep, but Bhide has an even stronger tea. Meanwhile, Madhvi is upset that Bhide chooses to sleep on the balcony.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal suspects Tappu is hiding something from him. Tappu is secretly planning a trip to Goa with his friends.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sonu and Madhavi convince Bhide to let them go on the trip to Goa. Tapu Sena are happy that they can go on a trip together, but Gogi is still waiting for his answer.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide arranges a meeting before the trip to Goa. However, he gets into an argument with Jethalal, and an annoyed Champaklal refuses to go with them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu Sena promise to plan the trip themselves, but Bhide believes they will spend excessively. Madhavi tries to get Bhide to relax.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal assigns Bhide to take care of Champaklal in Goa. At the airport, everyone questions the intensive security check before they find out that a thief is trying to smuggle an artefact.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: In Goa, the thief follows the Gokuldham society residents to their resort as he is determined to find the smuggled artefact.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tony's boss pressures him to find the smuggled artefact. The Gokuldham society residents are enjoying their vacation, unaware that Tony is following them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After failing to retrieve the artefact, Tony's boss reprimands him. While those who are in Goa enjoy sports day, Jethalal, Taarak, and the other residents call Bhide from Gokuldham.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Roshan, Sodhi, and Bhide meet a foreign tourist on the beach and introduce her to Popatlal. Madhavi and Roshan confront Sodhi and Bhide after learning of a secret.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sodhi and Bhide prank their wives by telling them they are going to have iced tea. Tapu Sena plan a surprise for the adults.

programme.desc: The thieves try to get away from Chalu Pandey, but Roshan Sodhi catches them. The police manage to arrest the mastermind behind the operation.

programme.desc: Tapu and his friends enjoy their vacation. They play cricket in the compound but eventually face numerous problems during their game.

programme.desc: Munnalal impresses the audience with his talents and involves the residents in his magical acts, enhancing the show's appeal.

programme.desc: Tapu and his friends visit Munnalal, who teaches them special tricks. The group showcase their newly acquired magical skills to everyone.
